EmailTemplate.name: IBD DBAAC Template
EmailTemplate.subject: IBD DBAAC - Inflammatory Bowel Disease Drug Benefit Adjudication Advisory Committee
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Doctors,
This week's cases have been posted in the Portal for your review. Link to the Portal
Meeting will be held on {!External_Committee__c.Start_Time__c}. Thank you to everyone who helped get these cases ready.
Please click on Log In to enter your username and password to view your cases.
DIAL IN: 1-888-952-9304
PASSWORD: 467872
{!External_Committee__c.Email_Message__c}
{!External_Committee__c.Agenda__c}
Thank you
The Special Authority Team

Lekwungen and W̱SÁNEĆ nations

If you have received this in error, please telephone or e-mail the sender immediately and delete the message.
